member.name: T:OxyPlot.WindowsUniversal.OxyColorConverter
member.summary: Converts from OxyPlot colors to Windows.UI.Color and vice versa.

member.name: T:OxyPlot.WindowsUniversal.ThicknessConverter
member.remarks: This is used to convert BorderThickness properties to Path.StrokeThickness (double). The maximum thickness value is used.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.WindowsUniversal.ThicknessConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.String)
member.returns: The maximum value of the thickness.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.WindowsUniversal.RenderContext.DrawEllipses(System.Collections.Generic.IList{OxyPlot.OxyRect},OxyPlot.OxyColor,OxyPlot.OxyColor,System.Double)
member.summary: Draws the collection of ellipses, where all have the same stroke and fill. This performs better than calling DrawEllipse multiple times.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.WindowsUniversal.RenderContext.DrawLine(System.Collections.Generic.IList{OxyPlot.ScreenPoint},OxyPlot.OxyColor,System.Double,System.Double[],OxyPlot.LineJoin,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws the polyline from the specified points.
member.param: if set to true the shape will be aliased.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.WindowsUniversal.RenderContext.DrawLineSegments(System.Collections.Generic.IList{OxyPlot.ScreenPoint},OxyPlot.OxyColor,System.Double,System.Double[],OxyPlot.LineJoin,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws the multiple line segments defined by points (0,1) (2,3) (4,5) etc. This should have better performance than calling DrawLine for each segment.
member.param: if set to true the shape will be aliased.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.WindowsUniversal.RenderContext.DrawPolygon(System.Collections.Generic.IList{OxyPlot.ScreenPoint},OxyPlot.OxyColor,OxyPlot.OxyColor,System.Double,System.Double[],OxyPlot.LineJoin,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws the polygon from the specified points. The polygon can have stroke and/or fill.
member.param: if set to true the shape will be aliased.

member.summary: Draws a collection of polygons, where all polygons have the same stroke and fill. This performs better than calling DrawPolygon multiple times.
member.param: if set to true the shape will be aliased.

member.summary: Draws a collection of rectangles, where all have the same stroke and fill. This performs better than calling DrawRectangle multiple times.

member.name: T:OxyPlot.WindowsUniversal.TrackerDefinition
member.remarks: The tracker definitions make it possible to show different trackers for different series. The property is matched with the in the TrackerDefinitions collection in the control.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.WindowsUniversal.TrackerDefinition.TrackerKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracker key.
member.remarks: The Plot will use this property to find the TrackerDefinition that matches the TrackerKey of the current series.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.WindowsUniversal.TrackerDefinition.TrackerTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracker template.
member.remarks: The tracker control will be added/removed from the Tracker overlay as necessary. The DataContext of the tracker will be set to a TrackerHitResult with the current tracker data.
